Posts.Content: Hi, not sure if this helps but I was told I needed to get high doses of fish oil to help with joint stiffness and pain. I was told red krill oil is much better than cod liver oil. I've been taking it for a couple of months and have noticed a big improvement. Emmers
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen (for probably the millionth time)

Posts.Content: Thanks Rebecca. I have strattice biomesh with silicone implants. Ive had double masectomy but thankfully only need radiotherapy on my left side - so possibility I could have similar problem to you, with one breast sitting a bit differently to the other. Good that your surgeon can adjust your implant. Amazing what they can do these days!Â  Emmers
Posts.Title: Effects of Radiotherapy on Breast Implants

Posts.Content: Hi, I'm worried about the effects Radiotherapy might have on my breast implant. Has anyone managed to get through it without any problems? Or if you did have problems, what were they? Thanks Emmers
